languages.text: Корабельное орудие, как правило, устанавливаемое по бортам или на {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}башне{/g}. При выстреле дает несколько залпов по одной цели.
A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.
languages.original_text: Корабельное орудие, как правило, устанавливаемое по бортам или на {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}башне{/g}. При выстреле дает несколько залпов по одной цели.

traits.locale_text: A type of ship's weapons generally mounted on the sides or the dorsal. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.
A type of ship's weapons generally mounted on the sides or the dorsal. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.
A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the dorsal section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.
A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.
A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

languages.text: Ein Raumschiffwaffentyp, der üblicherweise auf den Seiten oder im {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-Bereich montiert wird. Makro-Kanonen können mehrere Salven auf dasselbe Ziel abfeuern.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

traits.locale_text: Ein Raumschiffwaffentyp, der üblicherweise auf den Seiten oder im {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-Bereich montiert wird. {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} können mehrere Salven auf dasselbe Ziel abschießen.

languages.text: Type d'arme de vaisseau spatial généralement montée sur les flancs ou la section {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsale{/g}. Lorsqu'ils sont mis à feu, les macro-canons lancent plusieurs salves contre la même cible.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

traits.locale_text: Type d'arme de vaisseau spatial généralement monté sur les flancs ou la section {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsale{/g}. Lorsqu'ils sont mis à feu, les {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} lancent plusieurs salves contre la même cible.

Type d'arme de vaisseau spatial généralement monté sur les flancs ou la section {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsale{/g}. Lorsqu'ils sont mis à feu, les macro-canons lancent plusieurs salves contre la même cible.

languages.text: 虚空舰的武器，通常安装在侧舷或{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}部分。宏炮开火时，会对同一个目标发起多次齐射。
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰的武器，通常安装在侧舷或{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}部分。{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}开火时，会对同一个目标发起多次齐射。

languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the dorsal section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

languages.text: Un arma de nave del vacío normalmente instalada en los flancos o la sección {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. Al disparar, los macrocañones lanzan varias salvas contra el mismo objetivo.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

traits.locale_text: Un arma de nave del vacío normalmente instalada en los flancos o la sección {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. Al disparar, los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} lanzan varias salvas contra el mismo objetivo.

languages.text: 側面または{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}に搭載されるヴォイドシップ兵器のタイプの一つ。発射するとマクロキャノンが同じターゲットに対して数回斉射する。
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.

traits.locale_text: 側面または{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}に搭載されるヴォイドシップ兵器のタイプの一つ。発射すると{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}が同じターゲットに対して数回斉射する。

languages.text: Genellikle yanlara veya {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}sırt{/g} kısmına monte edilen bir uçsuz gemisi silahı türü. Makro toplar ateşlendiğinde aynı hedefe birden fazla salvo yapar.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the sides or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} section. When fired, macro-cannons launch several salvos against the same target.
